word_group.brief_definition: 穷困的, 拮据的, 境况不佳的
因感情（尤指爱情）问题深受煎熬；处于苦难中；深受折磨
装备糟糕；设备很差；装备很差
愈合不好的伤口；愈合不佳的伤口

bilingual.target: 她严重地需要一个假期。
他摔倒了，严重地受伤了。
他在考试中表现得严重地差。
这个项目严重地超出了预算。

bilingual.source: He was badly injured in the accident.
bilingual.target: 他在事故中受了严重地伤。
这次事故严重地影响了交通。

bilingual.source: The house was badly damaged by the storm.
bilingual.target: 房子被风暴严重地损坏了。

bilingual.source: His car was badly damaged in the accident.
bilingual.target: 他的车在事故中严重地受损了。

bilingual.source: Her cold badly affected her work efficiency.
bilingual.target: 她的感冒严重地影响了她的工作效率。

bilingual.source: The company is badly in need of new equipment.
bilingual.target: 公司严重地需要新设备。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on Joey, don't make me feel badly about this.
One particular employer took their failure very very badly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一个主人对他们犯的错误十分愤怒。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know why they want it so badly? The Pixum?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道他们为什么这么想要精灵粉吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why would Lane want it so badly if it wasn't authentic?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果是假的，为什么莱恩这么想得到它？

yingyinNormal.en: Quite the performance. I've never seen anyone mess up that badly. That helped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真是好样的，没见过有人捅出这么大的篓子，你帮了大忙。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, could you do me a favor and not tell Bernadette how badly I blew this interview?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，你能帮我个忙吗？不要告诉伯纳黛特我面试情况有多差。

yingyinNormal.en: How's the fundraising going? That depends. Raj, was that a "Yes"? No. It's going badly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的募款进行得如何了？看情况，拉杰，买吗？不买。进行得不顺。

yingyinNormal.en: Then they killed them. And then I ran. Everyone I cared about is gone and it hurts so badly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他们杀了他们，然后我跑了，我关心的人都不在了，内心好痛苦，撕心裂肺。

yingyinNormal.en: And he informed me that she took the news rather badly, in fact,he mentioned the word frenzy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说她一时无法适应，老实说，他提到“狂暴”这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: One day we were ambushed. I was badly wounded. My friend carried me for days looking for help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一天，我们遭到了埋伏，我身负重伤，我的朋友背着我日以继夜地寻求帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: Mathilda, you're just a little girl, so don't take it badly, but I don't think you could do it. I'm sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还只是个小女孩，所以别难过，但我不觉得你能当个杀手，对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Why do you want to play this game so badly? Yeah. It's not like it spits out a Clark bar after every game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要玩这个游戏？它不会吐出糖果。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I must say sorry, I do not speak English very well. You don't speak too badly. You are very kind, Monsieur Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是，我要先说一声抱歉，因为我的英文说的并不是很好。但是你说的也不差啊。你真是太好了，猪爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: If handled badly, some of them can lead to your ruin. But to evolve, you need to identify those problems and not tolerate them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果处理不当可能就会毁了你。但要进步就得认清这些问题，绝不容忍。

yingyinNormal.en: To be clear, these are vicious men who take pride in their atrocities. Any attempt by you to contact them is likely to end very badly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请您听好，这都是些对自己犯下的暴行引以为傲的亡命之徒。如果您试图与他们接触，那结果会非常糟糕。

yingyinNormal.en: Viola, you're losing, you're losing badly. We'll make you this deal. Stop right now and we won't countersue you for filing a frivolous lawsuit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 维奥拉，你输了，还输得很惨。这么着吧，别继续了，我们也不会反诉你们，告你们挑起无谓诉讼。

yingyinNormal.en: Lorrie, if this goes badly, my career as a safety expert will end as a website and a business card. I'm more worried about your career as a pilot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洛丽，如果情况急转直下，我作为安全专家的事业，会连同网站和生意一同消失。我更在乎的是你机长的事业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A federal appeals court weighed in again Tuesday, but instead of providing a <highlight>badly</highlight> needed resolution, it only prolonged the fight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家联邦上诉法院周二再次介入，但它没有提供急需的解决方案，只是延长了这场斗争。
这种趋势是迫切需要的。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>badly</highlight> run "year of culture" washes in and washes out of a place like the tide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个糟糕的“文化年”像潮水一样在一个地方进进出出。

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize how serious a situation or an event is

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，他们有时会自杀，因为他们受到如此恶劣的对待。

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize how serious a situation or an event is

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把自己的肘部伤得很重。

examination_example.sentence: He slept <highlight>badly</highlight> and didn't feel like eating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他睡得不好，也不想吃东西。

examination_example.sentence: Behave <highlight>badly</highlight> to his team members or competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对团队成员或竞争对手举止很差

examination_example.sentence: I acted <highlight>badly</highlight> in class, and I feel sorry about that now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在课堂上表现不好，现在我感到很抱歉。
